version_description:
WIT "What is this" comes true to it's name: Images can now be blurred by the degree it's shuffled. Images be come clearer as the puzzle is solved.
Truly surprise your friends!

New Features:
• Allow blurring shuffled images: Solving slowling sharpens the image
• Custom titles supported
• Options when creating puzzles
• Transparent creation background

Bug Fixes:
• If you abort during the puzzle creation, the unfinished wit will be autodeleted.

World of WIT takes over from here. It's the same iMessage app, but with a full fledged app underneath for any social media or where ever you can post a link.
